resources.string:
SmoothLife is a generalization of Conway's Game of Life to a continuous domain originally presented in a research paper by Stephen Rafler:
https://arxiv.org/abs/1111.1567

There are many implementations, but this one is (one of) mine. If you are so inclined, I have a Python implementation here:
https://github.com/duckythescientist/SmoothLife
